XXbhivin_u:2533: śūnyam asāram kañ ca kāyaṃ viditvā nirodhakṣayadharmakaṃ tathā |
XXbhivin_u:2534: saṃbhūtā vibhūtā ca bhavagatītī ko bhavagatīṣu rameta yuktayogī || [2] ||
XXbhivin_u:2535: idañ ca duḥkhaṃ vedayitvā tasya mūlaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca utpadyati |
XXbhivin_u:2536: duḥkhamūle kāyacittañ ca etaṃ anuśrotagāminaṃ muktañ ca cittaṃ vihanenti māraṃ || [3] ||
XXbhivin_u:2537: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat |
XXbhivin_u:2538: kiṃ bhagavann imāhi śākiyāyinīhi purā pāpaṃ karma kṛtam yena etāyo evaṃ duḥkhām vedanām vedayanti
XXbhivin_u:2540: bhūtapūrvam ānanda etāyo śākiyāyinīyo ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ ṣaḍ gaṇikāyo abhūvan |
XXbhivin_u:2541: ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ kālo nāma pratyekabhuddho abhūṣi |
XXbhivin_u:2542: so dāni piṇḍāya caranto tāhi gaṇikāhi ukto |
XXbhivin_u:2543: ayaṃ dāni śramaṇo svayaṃ kāmān paribhuñjati |
XXbhivin_u:2545: tāhi hāsyābhiprāyāhi viheṭhanābhiprāyāhi anyehi duruktehi vacanapathehi obhartsito aṅgāramallakehi cāvakīrṇaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2546: so dāni ānanda pratyekabuddho duḥkhāya vedanāya spṛṣṭaḥ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanto kāyena ca jīvitena ca ardiyanto tatraiva vihāya samabhyudgamya anupādāya parinivṛtaḥ
XXbhivin_u:2547: | pūrvādhiṣṭhitena ca svakena tejodhātunā tasya śarīraṃ vyāpinaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2548: tāyo dāni gaṇikāyo bhītayo pāpakam asmābhiḥ karmopacitaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2557: anāgatam adhvānam vayam etādṛśaṃ śāstāram ārāgayemaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2560: tāyo etāyo tena pāpena karmeṇa kṛtena yāvan narakeṣūpapannāyo etāyo tahiṃ bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaveṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2561: etāhi ānanda bālapṛthagjanāhi hasantīhi pāpakarma kṛtaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2563: yam etāhi sā pūjā kṛtā vipratisāraś cotpāditaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2564: yaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ anāgatam adhvānaṃ etādṛśaṃ śastāram ārāgayemaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2567: yāvat pañcānām avarabhāgīyānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ yāvat tatra parinirvāyinyaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2571: tasmāt tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ kāraṇavaipulyan nāma dhāraya idam avocat |
XXbhivin_u:2573: kāścid anto nagare nilīnāḥ kāścid bahir nirgatāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2590: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
XXbhivin_u:2591: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
XXbhivin_u:2592: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā ekarātram pi vipravaseya anyatrasamayena
XXbhivin_u:2598: ekaṃ rātram pi vipravaseyā ti aruṇamudagame ca anyatrasamaye |
XXbhivin_u:2600: jarāburbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā nagaroparodho vā |
XXbhivin_u:2602: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī anto nagarato bahirdhā nirdhāvati bahirdhāto vā anto nagaraṃ praviśati |
XXbhivin_u:2604: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sasūrye vinā bhūtā bhikṣuṇīhi vipravustā aruṇamudghāteti saṃghātiśeṣo |
XXbhivin_u:2605: astamite sūrye vinā bhūtā aruṇamudghātayati thūl'-accayaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2606: bhikṣuṇīvihāre anyatra vā sarvāhi anto hastapāśasya pratikramitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2610: atha khalu yāme yāme purime yāme samavadhānaṃ na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:2611: madhyame yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:2612: paścime yāme na deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:2614: atha dāni dvibhūmakaṃ bhavati ekā heṣṭhime pratikramati aparā uparime |
XXbhivin_u:2617: yā punabhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇībhi vinā ekarātram pi vipravasiya anyatrasamaye |
XXbhivin_u:2619: nagaro parodhe vā ruddhā bhavati ayam atra samayo |
XXbhivin_u:2623: rājagṛhe dāni aparasya abhaṭagaṇasya sudinnikā nāma bhāryā taruṇī |
XXbhivin_u:2637: taṃhi dāni kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī prativasati |
XXbhivin_u:2652: so dāni puruṣo anupūrveṇa śrāvastīṃ gatvā pṛcchati |
XXbhivin_u:2657: pṛcchati yāvād āha katamā āryā kālīti sā dān āha |
XXbhivin_u:2660: prāptakālan nāma āryāye mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2668: ānetha saṃghāṭiṃ yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ bandhāpayāmi |
XXbhivin_u:2670: yāvad iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca bandhāpayeya iti |
XXbhivin_u:2671: so manuṣyo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca yāvad bahir gatvā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mahājanakāyasyārocayati
XXbhivin_u:2672: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryām ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājayati mama ca bhandhanena santarjeti
XXbhivin_u:2673: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti |
XXbhivin_u:2682: evan nāma tvaṃ anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayasi
XXbhivin_u:2683: | tena hi na kṣamati anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2685: paśya bhagavan katham iyaṃ kālīya pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā |
XXbhivin_u:2688: na ceṣā bhikṣuṇīyo kālīya etarhy eva pratyutpannapratibhānatāya mocitā |
XXbhivin_u:2692: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo iyam eva nagarī vārāṇasī |
XXbhivin_u:2693: iyaṃ strī rātrau dārikāṃ skandhenādāya gacchati |
XXbhivin_u:2696: tāya striyāya sā dārikā capeṭāya āhatā |
XXbhivin_u:2697: eko te siṃho khādito etam pi khāditukāmāsi |
XXbhivin_u:2699: yādṛśī eṣā strī dhvāṅkṣā ca mukharā ca khādaty |
XXbhivin_u:2718: sā strī jalpati mā rodāhi dārike |
XXbhivin_u:2719: eṣo tava mātuḥ kenānīto keśehi gṛhītvā |
XXbhivin_u:2720: idāniṃ yan naṃ icchasi taṃ se khādāhīti |
XXbhivin_u:2725: yat tāvad ahaṃ ekaṃ vāraṃ prapalānaḥ kiṃ bhūyo nivartitaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2726: so dāni tasya markaṭasya avadhunitvā prapalānaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2731: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā strī abhūṣi |
XXbhivin_u:2733: iyam eva sā kālī strī abhūṣi |
XXbhivin_u:2734: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyā sā dārikā ti |
XXbhivin_u:2736: iyam eva sā sudinnikā dārikā abhūṣi |
XXbhivin_u:2737: syād bhikṣuṇīyo yuṣmākam evam asyād anyo so siṃho abhūṣīti |
XXbhivin_u:2742: 159. atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
XXbhivin_u:2743: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
XXbhivin_u:2744: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo
XXbhivin_u:2746: anujñāpakehi ananujñātām iti avūḍhāya dārikāya mātāpitarau anujñāpakā |
XXbhivin_u:2749: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām pravrājayati vinayātikramam āsādyati |
XXbhivin_u:2751: | upasaṃpādeti saṃghātiśeṣo eṣā kācit pravrajyāpekṣā āgacchati praṣṭavyā |
XXbhivin_u:2756: vūḍhā vaktavyā patidevarau śvaśruśvaśurāv anujānāpayitvā āgacchāhīti |
XXbhivin_u:2758: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anujñāpakehi ananujñātām upasthāpayed ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko saṃghātiśeṣo
XXbhivin_u:2763: taṃhi dāni aparasya mallasya bhāryā parapuruṣeṇa sārdham abhicarati |
XXbhivin_u:2767: 'to mā te aham evañ ca evañ ca asat kariṣyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2770: na punar aham ato doṣato viramiṣyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2771: tena sā sahoḍhaṃ gṛhītvā āsane upanāmitā |
XXbhivin_u:2772: iccheyam ahaṃ bhavanto imāṃ svadharmeṇa lambhiyamānāṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2774: yā strī anyena puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ abhicarati |
XXbhivin_u:2775: sā saptadivasāni dānavisargaṃ kārapetvā ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭīyati
XXbhivin_u:2778: tena dāni puruṣeṇa gṛhaṃ nayitvā uktā |
XXbhivin_u:2779: itikitikāya dhīte dada yat te asti ca nāsti ca |
XXbhivin_u:2780: sapta divasāni ahaṃ te ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2781: sā dāni ubhayato jñātisaṃghaṃ sannipātetvā annaṃ pānaṃ khādyaṃ bhojyaṃ samudānīya rodati |
XXbhivin_u:2783: kiṃ ruditena tvayaiva tathā ceṣṭitaṃ yena tvam evaṃ duḥkham anubhaviṣyasi |
XXbhivin_u:2787: api tu ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya purato gopāṭikāya pāṭayiṣyan ti |
XXbhivin_u:2797: sā tasyā vacanaṃ śrutvā janasya khādyantasya pibantasya pramattasya yathā vā tathā vā nirdhāvitvā anupūrveṇa pṛcchapṛcchikāya śrāvastīm āgatā |
XXbhivin_u:2818: putriṇi yā tvaṃ nisṛṣṭā sunisṛṣṭā yā tvaṃ gopāṭikāyāṃ nisṛṣṭā |
XXbhivin_u:2832: prāptan nāmāryāya mama bhāryām anotsṛṣṭām pravrājayituṃ
XXbhivin_u:2838: caṇḍāyu coras tvam ocorakas tvam ocaritukāmo tvaṃ śrāvastīyaṃ praviṣṭaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2839: na tvaṃ jānāsi nityaviruddhāḥ śrāvasteyāḥ āmalakakalyāś ca |
XXbhivin_u:2841: ānehi tāva samaghāṭim yāvad imaṃ caṇḍāyuṃ dhare cāṭikaṃ rājakule bhandhāpemi |
XXbhivin_u:2843: yādṛśī iyaṃ śramaṇikā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ca |
XXbhivin_u:2845: eṣa so dāni puruṣo ojjhāyati ca osakkati ca |
XXbhivin_u:2846: so dāni puruṣo bhikṣuṇī nāṃ mahājanakāyasya ca puro ojjhāyati |
XXbhivin_u:2847: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā bhāryāñ ca me anotsṛṣṭāṃ pravrājeti |
XXbhivin_u:2849: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayanti |
XXbhivin_u:2852: evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayasi |
XXbhivin_u:2853: tena hi na kṣamati jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2857: yāvad anyā tāva mayā īdṛśī yeva pravrājitā |
XXbhivin_u:2860: sā dāni aparāparāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām allīnā na kācit pravrājeti |
XXbhivin_u:2867: idānīṃ sā itikitikāya dhītā sumahatā dṛṣṭadhārmikena ca vadhena |
XXbhivin_u:2869: so punar na gaveṣati na pṛcchati |
XXbhivin_u:2870: sā pi dāni tena tīrthikabhāvena tīrthikabhāvenārtīyati |
XXbhivin_u:2874: nagnā ahrīkā anotrāpiṇo istrikāmā pi dūṣenti |
XXbhivin_u:2876: moha bhāginī asmākaṃ pravrajyā gartasmi patitā |
XXbhivin_u:2890: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
XXbhivin_u:2892: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayed anyatra samaye |
XXbhivin_u:2896: jānantīti svayam vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya |
XXbhivin_u:2898: viditān ti ubhayato jñātisaṃghasya mātṛpakṣasya pitṛpakṣasya ca |
XXbhivin_u:2900: jñātayo nāma kṣatriyāṅ brāhmaṇāḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ambaṣṭhavaidehāḥ bhaṭanāḥ kuṅkumālāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2902: | keṣāñcit kīṭena vā kāliñjena vā veṭhayitvā dahyati |
XXbhivin_u:2903: keṣāñcit vālukāghaṭakaṃ kaṇṭhe badhvā udake praveśiyati |
XXbhivin_u:2906: keṣāñcit taptaṃ phālaṃ vraṇamukhe anuśrotaṃ prakṣipīyati |
XXbhivin_u:2908: kṣatriyāṇāṃ palālena śarehi ca veṭhayitvā dahyati |
XXbhivin_u:2909: abhīrāṇām vālukāya ghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bhadhvā udake prakṣipati |
XXbhivin_u:2912: taptam vā phālaṃ anuśrote vraṇamukhe prakṣipīyanti |
XXbhivin_u:2914: anyatra samaye ti pratyuddhṛtaṃ bhagavatā padaṃ anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2918: carakaparivrājakanirgranthājīvakatredaṇḍikāḥ mākandikāḥ gudugudukāḥ gautamadharmacintakāḥ vṛddhaśrāvakaḥ dakatṛtīyakāḥ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:2919: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñāti daṇḍaprāptāṃ pravrajayati vinayātikramam āsādayati
XXbhivin_u:2923: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī vadhyāṃ viditāṃ jñātidaṇḍaprāptām upasthāpayet |
XXbhivin_u:2931: atha saṃbahulā striyo nadīyam ajirāvatīyaṃ snāyanti |
XXbhivin_u:2933: sā tāvad ekānte cīvarakāṇi nikṣipya bāhubhyāṃ pratīrṇā |
XXbhivin_u:2936: sā kayadhānake muhūrtam viśramitvā punar evāgatā |
XXbhivin_u:2944: mahāprajāpatī gautami bhagavato āroceti yāvad bhagavān āha |
XXbhivin_u:2946: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ ekākinī nadīṃ tarasi |
XXbhivin_u:2947: tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tarituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2948: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
XXbhivin_u:2949: sannipātaya gautami bhikṣuṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
XXbhivin_u:2950: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tare ayaṃ pi dharmo prathamāpattiko |
XXbhivin_u:2953: nadīti yā bahiḥ sīmāto pravahantī bahiḥ sīmām upeti |
XXbhivin_u:2956: yāvatā ca etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadīn taranti anto hastapāśe taritavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2960: athavaikā madhye tiṣṭhati aparā taranti thūl'-accayaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2963: etāyo bhikṣuṇīyo nadyāṃ snāyanti ante hastapāśena snātavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2966: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīya vinā nadīn tareya |
XXbhivin_u:2971: tahiṃ kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī grāmacārikāṃ gatā |
XXbhivin_u:2972: tasyā gatāya antevāsinīye bhikṣuṇīsaṃghena utkṣepanīyakarma kṛtaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:2981: sā dāni anyadā cānyadā ca yadā grāmacārikāṃ caritvā āgatā bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:2983: tāyo bhikṣuṇīyo sannipatathety uktā śīghraṃ śīghraṃ sannipatitāḥ kiñcid vaibhaṅgikaṃ dāsyatīti
XXbhivin_u:2988: yadi saṃghasya prāptakālaṃ saṃgho itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosareya |
XXbhivin_u:2994: yasyā āryamiśrikānāṃ kṣamati itthannāmāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ pratyosāryamāṇāṃ saṃghena sā tūṣṇīm asya yasyā na kṣamati sā bhāṣetu |
XXbhivin_u:2996: evaṃ traivācikaṃ pratyosāritā āryamiśrikā iyam itthannāmā bhikṣuṇī |
XXbhivin_u:2998: kṣamati taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etaṃ dhārayāmi |
XXbhivin_u:2999: atha sā dhṛṣṭā ca mukharā ca pragalbhā ceti na kācit pratikṣipati |
XXbhivin_u:3004: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇyo mahāprajāpatyā gautamyā ārocayeyuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:3012: duṣkṛtaṃ te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptām apratikṛtāṃ |
XXbhivin_u:3017: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantrayati |
XXbhivin_u:3019: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ apratikṛtāṃ
XXbhivin_u:3024: yā puna bhikṣuṇīti upasampannā yāvad ubhayataḥ saṃghena |
XXbhivin_u:3026: svayam vā jāne parato vā śrutvā |
XXbhivin_u:3034: akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ ti prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇīyo asaṃjñāpayitvā |
XXbhivin_u:3036: saṃghamadhye avalokanām akṛtvā svayam eva pratyosārayet |
XXbhivin_u:3038: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ samagreṇa saṃghena dharmato vinayato utkṣiptāṃ |
XXbhivin_u:3043: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī samagreṇa saṃghena utkṣiptā bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:3044: yā tasyā upādhyāyī vā ācāryāyiṇī vā ca yā prakṛtisthā bhikṣuṇyāḥ tā saṃjñāpayitavyāḥ |

XXbhivin_u:6756: yāni khalu punar imāni gṛhiṇīnam iti kṣatriyakanyakānāṃ brāhmaṇakanyakānāṃ gṛhapatikanyakānāṃ
XXbhivin_u:6757: udvartanaparimardanasnāpanasammatānīti kāleyakam vā tuṅgeyakam vā cikkasam vā |
XXbhivin_u:6758: yady eko vā tehi bhikṣuṇīhi agilānā udvartāpayet |
XXbhivin_u:6759: kin tāvad atra gailānyam abhipretaṃ jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhavati udvartāpayaty anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6761: atha dāni gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā bhavati labhyā bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayituṃ parimardāpayituṃ
XXbhivin_u:6762: atha dāni pittasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā cikkasenāliṃpituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6763: atha dāni vātasaṃkṣobho bhavati labhyā godhūmacikkasenāliṃpituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6764: atha dāni sannipāto bhavati saṃyuktehi bhaiṣajyehi udvartāpayitavyaṃ parimardāpayitavyaṃ āliṃpitavyaṃ
XXbhivin_u:6765: tāya pi dāni āliṃpiya na kṣamati abhyāgame pradeśe sthātuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6768: bhikṣur api agilāno cikkasenodvartāpayet parimardāpayed vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:6770: yā puna bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇīnām udvartanaparimardanasnānasammatehi udvartāpayeta parimardāpayeta pācattikaṃ ||

XXbhivin_u:6836: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā poṣadhan na gacchati |
XXbhivin_u:6837: gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6838: bhikṣur api agilāno naiva poṣadhaṃ gacchati na cchandan deti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:6840: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ agilānā viśuddhisaṃvāsan na satkareya pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6856: te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvargikāḥ ovādakavāraṃ na labhanti |
XXbhivin_u:6861: āyuṣmāṃ cchāriputraḥ sa khilo ca mṛduko ca |
XXbhivin_u:6863: na kṣamati asammatena bhikṣuṇā bhikṣuṇīyo ovadituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6865: te dāni niḥsīmaṃ gatvā anyamanyaṃ saṃmanyitvā kalyato yeva nivāsayitvā prāvaritvā ca bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatvā āhaṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6868: | yāyo yogācārāyo bhikṣuṇīyo tāyo na sannipatanti |
XXbhivin_u:6870: kim artham vayam eṣām avinītānām avavādaṃ gamiṣyāmaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6871: te dāni tāhi saha muhūrtam antaraṃ kākavaṃhā bhañjitvā gatāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6872: āyuṣmān dāni śāriputro kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaram ādāya āyuṣmatā ānandena paścāc chramaṇena sārdhaṃ vistareṇa |
XXbhivin_u:6886: ovaditā vayam āryamiśrakehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena |
XXbhivin_u:6887: athāyuṣmān śāriputro vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto prakrānto |
XXbhivin_u:6888: bhagavān jānanto yeva pṛcchati kin dāni gautamī mātā śīghram āgato si |
XXbhivin_u:6891: ahaṃ bhagavan kālasyaiva nivāsayitvā yāvad bhikṣuṇīupāśrayaṃ praviṣṭo ovadituṃ mayoktaṃ sannipatatha bhaginīyo ovādo bhaviṣyati |
XXbhivin_u:6893: | yāyo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo bhikṣuṇīyo tā na sannipatanti |
XXbhivin_u:6902: na vayam āgamiṣyāmaḥ ovaditā vayam āryamiśrikehi ṣaḍvargikehi anyavihitakena ovādena |
XXbhivin_u:6903: ahaṃ pi bhagavan vyagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho ti kṛtvā utthāyāsanāto sannirgato |
XXbhivin_u:6907: tad eva sarvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pṛcchati |
XXbhivin_u:6910: duṣkṛtaṃ vo ṣaḍvargiṇīyo yāvat paryavadātāni bhavanti |
XXbhivin_u:6911: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardha māsaṃ bhikṣusaṃghe ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6915: bhikṣusaṃghe ovadopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6916: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā ghṛtapītikā vā bhavati vaktavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6918: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agilānā ovādopasaṃkramaṇaṃ na gacchati gilānā vā chandan na deti pācattikam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:6919: yadā poṣadho bhavati tadā cchandahārikāhi bhikṣuvihāraṅ gatvā vaktavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6920: samagro bhikṣuṇīsaṃgho samagrasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pādāṃ cchirasā vandati poṣadhañ ca pratīcchati avavādaṃ ca yācati evaṃ trikkhatto yācitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6921: yadi tāvat kocid bhikṣuṇīovādako bhavati vaktavyaṃ
XXbhivin_u:6923: atha na kocid bhavati yo taṃhi aṅgopeto bhavati so saṃmanyitavyo |
XXbhivin_u:6925: nāsti bhaginīyo bhikṣuṇīovādako apramādena saṃpādetha āpattiñ ca poṣadhaṃ pratijāgratha sagauravā ca bhavatha sthavirehi bhikṣūhi madhyehi navakehīti |
XXbhivin_u:6927: yā puna bhikṣuṇī anvardhamāsaṃ viśuddhipoṣadhaṃ na satkareya pācattikaṃ ||
XXbhivin_u:6931: jetāye bhikṣuṇīye saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam utpannaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6938: so dāni pāṭayitvā dhovāyitvā upanāhayitvā gato |
XXbhivin_u:6940: tāhi dāni so pradeśo dṛṣṭo pūyamrakṣito |
XXbhivin_u:6946: sāhasam āryāya kṛtaṃ saṃbādhe pradeśe śastrakarma kārayantīya |
XXbhivin_u:6947: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6951: evaṃ ca nāma tvaṃ upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ śastrakarma kārāpayasi |
XXbhivin_u:6955: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyām adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pātāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpayed vā pācattikaṃ ||
XXbhivin_u:6959: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyan ti bhikṣuṇī vaktavyo śastrakarma kārāpayiṣyan ti |
XXbhivin_u:6960: anavalokayitvā saṃghā ti saṃghamadhye avalokanā kartavyā |

XXbhivin_u:6962: kṣamate taṃ saṃghasya yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi |
XXbhivin_u:6963: puruṣeṇeti gṛhasthena vā pravrajitena vā pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpeya vā ti yathā jetā bhikṣuṇīti pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6964: atha dāni saṃbādhe pradeśe gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati antevāsinīye vā samānopādhyāyinīye vā samānācāryāye vā yasyā viśvāso tāya ākhyātavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6965: kaṇṭakena vā nakhena vā bhedāpayitavyaṃ bhaiṣajyena vā ālimpāpeyatavyaṃ atha dāni adho jānumaṇḍalābhyām upari kakṣābhyām bhavati gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayati vā dhovāpayati vā upanāhāpayati vā evam śirām vā vedhāpayati nelāṭikam vā bāhuśirām vā gulphaśirām vā aparāya bhikṣuṇīya ākramitavyā tena bhagavān āha |
XXbhivin_u:6966: yā puna bhikṣuṇī upari jānumaṇḍalābhyāṃ adho kakṣābhyāṃ gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā akṛtvā pūrvakṛtyaṃ anavalokayitvā saṃghaṃ puruṣeṇa pāṭāpayed vā dhovāpayed vā upanāhāpayed vā pācattikaṃ ||
XXbhivin_u:6970: atha kālī nāma bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā sāṃghikaṃ vihāraṃ bandhitvā cārikāṃ prakrāntāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6971: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6975: duṣkṛtam te kāli evan nāma tvaṃ varṣopagatānāṃ cārikāṃ prakramasi |
XXbhivin_u:6976: tena hi na kṣamati varṣopagatāya cārikāṃ prakramituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6977: atha khalu bhagavān yāvat paryavadātāni bhaviṣyanti |
XXbhivin_u:6978: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrāmeya pācattikaṃ |

XXbhivin_u:6982: cārikāṃ prakrāmeyā ti anyatra gaccheya grāmāntaraṃ pi pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6983: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ekarātram pi vipravasati pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:6984: atha dāni rājabhayam vā senābhayam vā paracakrabhayam vā jīvitāntarāyo vā brahmacaryāntarāyo vā bhaveya kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6985: nāsti bhikṣuṇyā avalokanākarma saptāhaṃ vā kiñcāpi bhikuḥ avalokanākarma kṛtvā saptāhaṃ vā adhiṣṭhiheya gacchaty anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:6987: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣopagatā cārikāṃ prakrameya pācattikaṃ ||3 ||
XXbhivin_u:6991: bhikṣuṇīyo dāni śrāvastīyaṃ varṣoṣitāḥ vaiśālīm āgatāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7000: idṛśī ca idṛśī ca evam ārāmaramaṇīyā |
XXbhivin_u:7006: yadi pravrajyā eṣā pravrajyā iyaṃ punar asmākam āryadhītā ihaiva jātā |
XXbhivin_u:7008: naiva kahiñci gacchati kūpamaṇḍūka iva tiṣṭhati aniḥkramā |
XXbhivin_u:7009: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7011: tena hi varṣāvustāyā bhikṣuṇīya cārikā prakramitavyā |
XXbhivin_u:7013: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7015: varṣoṣiteti vārṣikāṃ trayo māsān cārikāṃ na prakrameyā ti antamasato grāmāntaraṃ pi vā pācattikaṃ yāvat prajñaptiḥ
XXbhivin_u:7016: | sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī evaṃ rātraṃ pi prakramati pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7017: atha dāni jarādurbalā vā vyādhidurbalā vā bhoti na pratibalā gantuṃ kiñcāpi gacchati anāpattiḥ
XXbhivin_u:7018: bhikṣur api varṣāvusto cārikāṃ na prakramati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7020: yā puna bhikṣuṇī varṣāvustā cārikāṃ na prakrameya pācattikaṃ || ṇka ||
XXbhivin_u:7024: sthūlanandāya bhikṣuṇīya jetā bhikṣuṇī rājagṛhaṃ gacchamānī nivāritā |
XXbhivin_u:7025: ihāryāya varṣā vasitavyā tāya sā kulehi samvarṇitā |
XXbhivin_u:7026: āryā jetā bhadrikā guṇavatī anubaddhā tā saṃvṛtā ca |
XXbhivin_u:7027: etāya adhikāraṃ karotha sā dāni kulāni upasaṃkramati prāsādikena atikrāntena pratikrāntena avalokitena vyavalokitena sammiñjitaprasāritena saṃghāṭīpātracīvaradhāraṇena anubaddhā anunnaḍā acapalā amukharā aprakīrṇavācā |
XXbhivin_u:7030: pratyālapanti pratyutthihenti nimantrayanti pātreṇa cīvareṇa glānapratyayabhaiṣajya pariṣkārehi
XXbhivin_u:7031: sthūlanandā bhikṣuṇi anākalpasaṃpannā anīryāpathasampannā omalinamalinehi cīvarehi pāṭitavipāṭitehi vaḍḍaḍiṅgarapuṣṭālaṃbehi stanehi vaḍḍhehi sphicakehi uddhatā unnaḍā capalā mukharā prakīrṇavācā te tasyā na gauravaṃ kurvanti na nimantrayanti |
XXbhivin_u:7032: sā dāni tāṃ udvahati kāyena vācā |
XXbhivin_u:7033: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7035: śabdāpayatha nandāṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā tad eva sarvaṃ pṛcchīyatīti yāvad āma bhagavan |
XXbhivin_u:7036: bhagavān āha duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat |
XXbhivin_u:7037: yā puna bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm evam uktvā ihārye varṣaṃ vasitavyaṃ ity uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7039: bhikṣuṇīm evam vade ihārye varṣāṃ vasitavyam iti trayo māsāṃ uktveti nivārayitvā paścād udvaheya vā ti kāyena vā vācā vā svayaṃ udvahati |
XXbhivin_u:7040: udvāhāpeya vā ti pareṇa kāyena vā vācāya pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7042: na kṣamati nivārayitvā paścād udvahituṃ atha bhavati śithilikā vā bāhulikā vā aśikṣākāmā vā kalahakārikā vā paśyati yadīha vaśiṣyati āśrayam utpādayiṣyatīti |
XXbhivin_u:7044: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣuṇīm udvahati pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7045: śrāmaṇerīm vā śikṣamāṇāṃ vā udvahati vinayātikramaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7046: antamasato gṛhiṇī pi udvahati samvaragāmīvinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7047: yā puna bhikṣuṇī yevam vaditvā ihārye varṣam vasitavyan ti uktvā paścād udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā pācattikaṃ || tṛ ||
XXbhivin_u:7055: tatra ca bhikṣuṇīhi vihāroddeśaḥ śayanāsanoddeśaḥ kṛtaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7067: sā kāṣṭhakhaṇḍā ti yatra śākhāni praveśayati |
XXbhivin_u:7071: bhadrāyaṇi kin tvayā vihāro kṛto kim vikrīto |
XXbhivin_u:7072: sāṃghiko vihāro kim arthaṃ na praveśayiṣyam |
XXbhivin_u:7074: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7075: yāvat śabdāpayatha kāliṃ sā dāni śabdāpitā |
XXbhivin_u:7080: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī bhikṣuṇīṃ pūrvopagatāṃ paścād āgatvā udvaheya vā udvahāpeya vā kāyena vā vācāya vā pācattikaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7082: jānantīti svayaṃ vā jāneya parato vā śruṇeya |

XXbhivin_u:7450: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo paścimaṃ prahāṇaṃ svastikaparyaṅkena niṣīdanti |
XXbhivin_u:7451: athāparāye dāni bhikṣuṇīye vraṇamukhena dīrghako 'nusrotena praviṣṭo |

XXbhivin_u:7502: duṣkṛtaṃ te nande yāvat tena hi na kṣamati veṭhakena kāyaṃ veṭhayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7504: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veṭhakena paṭṭakena vā kāyaṃ veṭhayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7505: atha dāni paṭṭikāya vā lohakena vā kāyaṃ veṭhayati |
XXbhivin_u:7506: na kṣamati dvir api vellakaṃ trir api vellakaṃ veṭhayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7508: atha dāni vātena pārśvaṃ gṛhītaṃ bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:7509: gaṇḍam vā piṭakam vā kṣatam vā upahatam vā bhavati kiñcāpi paṭṭakena kāyaṃ veṭhayaty anāpattiḥ
XXbhivin_u:7517: prajāpatī prajāpati nidhyāyatha māṃ kim aham śobhāmi na śobhāmīti |
XXbhivin_u:7522: bhagavān āha tena hi na kṣamati śroṇībhaṇḍaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7525: śaṅkhāvarttakā vā śirikā vā pīlukā vā vidrumā vā akṣarakṣā vā suvarṇarūpyamayā vā maṇimayā vā prakālakā vā antamasato sūtramaṇikā vā bandhati |
XXbhivin_u:7526: tena ca śroṇībhaṇḍakachandaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7531: eṣaivārthotpattiḥ yāvad gṛhiṇībhaṇḍakam ābandhitvā yāvad bhagavān āha |
XXbhivin_u:7546: yad vā punar anyad api kiñcid gṛhiṇībhāṇḍaṃ sarvan na kṣamati |
XXbhivin_u:7547: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gṛhiṇībhaṇḍakam ābandhayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7548: atha dāni bhaiṣajyabhaṇḍakam ābandhati jvarasūtrakam vā anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7553: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahāntehi kulehi pravrajitā alaṅkārikāny ādāya |
XXbhivin_u:7554: kumārikānāṃ vuhyantīnāṃ utsavasamaye tithi parvaṇyā devayātrādiṣu kṛtakāni bhāṇḍakāni dadantī
XXbhivin_u:7559: tena hi na kṣamati gṛhiṇīalaṅkāraṃ dhārayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7560: yadi kācid gṛhiṇī pravrajati yadi tāya kiñcid alaṅkāraṃ bhavati vaktavyā visarjehi |
XXbhivin_u:7561: atha dāni paśyati durbhikṣa vā bhaveya piṇḍapāto vā na labhyeta jarādurbalā vā bhavati vyādhidurbalā vā gailānyam vā kiñcid bhaviṣyati alpalābho mātṛgrāmo mā vihanyeyā ti |
XXbhivin_u:7563: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī alaṅkāram aparityājayitvā pravrajeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7569: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākīyakanyāyo koliyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākulehi pravrajitā ceṭikām ādāya pravrajanti |
XXbhivin_u:7570: tāyo ceṭikāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo veśyaṃ (!) vāhayanti |
XXbhivin_u:7576: evaṃ ca nāma yūyaṃ veśyām upasthāpayatha |
XXbhivin_u:7577: tena hi na kṣamati veśyām (!) upasthāpayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7578: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī veśyām upasthāpayati tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7585: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo mallakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mahākulehi pravrajanti |
XXbhivin_u:7587: tāyo dāni ārāmikinīyo prāsādikāyo jano dāni ojjhāyati |
XXbhivin_u:7589: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīhi śrutaṃ yāvad āma bhagavan |
XXbhivin_u:7591: tena hi na kṣamati paudagalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7595: sā eṣā bhikṣūṇī yā paudgalikām ārāmikinīm upasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7601: tāye dāni pīnehi stanehi gacchantīya cīvaram utkṣipīyati |
XXbhivin_u:7606: bhagavān āha tena saṃkakṣikā nāma kartavyā |
XXbhivin_u:7607: samkakṣikāṃ prāvarantīya tathā prāvaritavyaṃ yathā dāni stanāpīḍitā bhavanti |
XXbhivin_u:7608: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī saṃkakṣikān nopasthāpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7609: santī na prāvarayati vinayātikramaḥ idam ucyate saṃkakṣikāpratisaṃyuktaṃ || 0 ||
XXbhivin_u:7615: tena hi na kṣamati nagnikāyā snātuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7618: na kṣamati nadīyam vā oghe vā puṣkiriṇīyam vā taḍāge vā nagnikāya snāpituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7621: atha dāni vihāre gupte pradeśe nagnikā snāyaty anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7630: so manuṣyo puno puno śabdaṃ śṛṇoti |
XXbhivin_u:7634: bhavatu āryaputra aham etaṃ jānāmi kin tavānena jñānena |
XXbhivin_u:7638: etā āryamiśrikāyo brahmacāriṇīyo kāmarāgena khajjantīyo hastatalena āsphoṭayanti āṅgajātaṃ
XXbhivin_u:7644: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī hastatalenāṅgajātam āsphoṭayati pātreṇa vā kupātreṇa vā kaṃsikāya vā viḍallāya vā anyena vā puna kenacit tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7649: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya kāmarāgeṇa khajjantīya jatumaṭṭhakaṃ mañcakaṃ yantritaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7652: tāya dāni saṃbhrāntāya asamanvāharitvā sa mañcako bahin niṣkāsito |
XXbhivin_u:7654: kahiṃ agnir utthito kasya gṛhād utthito |
XXbhivin_u:7662: jatumaṭṭhakaṃ nāma jatusya vā lohasya vā trapusya vā nāgrasya vā hārakūṭasya vā dantasya vā coḍakasya vā mṛttikāya vā aṅgajātakākāraṃ kṛtvā sve aṅgajāte praveśeti tena ca kāma rāgaṃ vinodeti thul'-accayam āsādayati
XXbhivin_u:7667: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi |
XXbhivin_u:7675: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo bāhirabāhireṇa dhovanti tathaiva durgandhaṃ vāyati |
XXbhivin_u:7676: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati |
XXbhivin_u:7680: bhikṣuṇīya dhovantīya ekam aṅguliveṭhakaṃ praveśayitvā dhovitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7682: atidūraṃ praveśeti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7687: tāsān dāni bhikṣuṇīnām anumāsaṃ anumāsaṃ ṛtur āgacchati |
XXbhivin_u:7689: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato āroceti |
XXbhivin_u:7693: yasyā eṣa ṛtur āgacchati śoṇitaṃ sravati tayā ānīcolakaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7695: nāpi kṣamati gāḍhaṃ nāpi kṣamati atidūraṃ praveśayituṃ yathā tenaiva kāmarāgam vinodayet |
XXbhivin_u:7697: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī atidūram vā praveśeti gāḍham vā praveśeti yathā tenaiva kāmarāgam vindodeti
XXbhivin_u:7703: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo strītīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovanti |
XXbhivin_u:7709: tena hi na kṣamati stritīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7711: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ strītīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7718: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo puruṣatīrthe ānīcolakaṃ dhovanti |
XXbhivin_u:7720: yāvat sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ānīcolakaṃ puruṣatīrthe dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7727: tena hi na kṣamati rajakatīrthe dhovituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7728: atha khu kuṇḍālake vā kaṭāhake vā mallake vā dakānake vā udakaṃ gṛhya ekānte dhovitavyaṃ
XXbhivin_u:7730: atha dāni bāhirodakaṃ bhavati yahiṃ nirvāho tahin dhovitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7731: tāni leṇṭakāni śoṣayitavyāni yadā puno ṛtu nāgacchati tadā puno dātavyāni |
XXbhivin_u:7732: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī rajakatīrthe ānīcolaṃ dhovati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7738: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya raktacittāya aṅgajātaṃ udake dhāritaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7743: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī udakadhārāyām vā kuṇḍikadhārāyām vā udakacoḍena vā ālukaveṇṭikāyām vā praṇālyām vā aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam
XXbhivin_u:7745: atha dāni snāyati taḍāge vā prasravaṇe vā praṇāliyam vā na dāni agrato udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyitavyaṃ yathā pṛṣṭhīya vā śīrṣeṇa vā udakadhārāṃ praticcheya tathā snāyitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7746: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agrato mukhāṃ udakadhārāṃ kṛtvā snāyati tāya ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam
XXbhivin_u:7752: aparāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya raktacittāya udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhāritaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7753: tāye aśucir āgato yathā udakadhārāya yāvat
XXbhivin_u:7754: | tena hi na kṣamati udakasrote aṅgajātaṃ dhārayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7756: yā dāni tāyo bhavanti girinadīyo śīghrasrotāyo tahiṃ aṅgajātaṃ dhāreti tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accyam āsādayati
XXbhivin_u:7757: | atha dāni snāyati na kṣamati agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyituṃ
XXbhivin_u:7759: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī agratomukhaṃ srotaṃ kṛtvā snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7765: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo nānāprakārehi mocayanti mūlakena palāṇḍūkebukāye sobhañjanakena latikāya
XXbhivin_u:7768: tena hi na kṣamati vikṛtīhi mocayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7770: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī mūlakena vā palāṇḍūya vā kebukāya vā sobhañjanakena vā latikāya vā illādukāya vā trapusena vā allābūya vā kakṣārukena vā anyena vā puna kenacin mocayati tena ca kāmarāgaṃ vinodeti thūl'-accayam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7775: aparasya dāni bhikṣusya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma kriyate |
XXbhivin_u:7779: kin nu khalu labhyā etaṃ kartuṃ utāho na labhyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7784: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7785: karmapratisaṃyuktaṃ na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya bhikṣusya karma kartuṃ (!) |
XXbhivin_u:7786: atha dāni na kocit parikuśalo karmakārako bhavati labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣusya uddeśituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7787: atha dāni karmakarentasya vismarati labhyā bhikṣuṇīya anupradātuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7788: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī bhikṣusya karma karoti vinayātikramaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7789: kiñcāpi bhikṣuḥ bhikṣuṇīye karma karoti anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7794: bhadrā dāni kāpileyī kauśeyacīvareṇa prāvṛtā jñātikulaṃ gacchati sthūlavṛṣito devo ovṛṣṭo kauśeyacīvaramovṛṣṭaṃ kāyeśliṣṭaṃ sphaṭikapratyuṣṭo viya kāyodṛśyati jano sannipātito bhadrāye aṅgayaṣṭiṃ paśyitukāmo |
XXbhivin_u:7795: sā dāni utkuṭukā upaviṣṭā antevāsinīhi parivṛtā |
XXbhivin_u:7804: karttimaṃ prāvarati samvaragāmīvinayātikramaḥ kiñcāpi bhikṣur ubhayaṃ prāvarati anāpattiḥ
XXbhivin_u:7809: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī vihārasyākāśatalake ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramati |
XXbhivin_u:7812: janena uccagghāyati paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇikā alābutumbakena viya nadīṃ taratīti |
XXbhivin_u:7818: saṃkakṣikāye upariṭo osārayitavyo yathā gaṇḍā praticchannā bhaveṃsuḥ sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī gaṇḍapraticchādanaṃ paṭaṃ na prāvarati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7819: na dāni kṣamati prākaṭe pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7820: na dāni kṣamati prākate pradeśe ekasaṃkakṣikāya caṅkramituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7821: atha dāni vihārasya gupte pradeśe caṅkramati ekasaṃkakṣikāya anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7828: yā dāni kumāriyo vuhyanti navavadhukāyo vā ānīyanti tāyo alaṅkarenti gṛheṇa gṛhan nīyanti
XXbhivin_u:7829: alaṅkarituṃ khajjabhojjaṃ labhanti tena vṛttiṃ kalpenti |
XXbhivin_u:7836: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī śīrṣam vā prasādheti akṣiṇī vā añjeti cūrṇakena vā mukhaṃ ocūrṇeti tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7837: atha dāni akṣiṇīduḥkham ti śirovedanā vā bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:7838: ardhāvabhedakā vā labhyā akṣiṇī añjayituṃ śīrṣam vā mārjayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7843: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo mahākula pravrajitāyo utpalāni vāpenti vikrīṇanti ca |
XXbhivin_u:7849: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni vāpayituṃ utpalavāpakapratisamyuktaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7850: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī vāpeti vikrīṇāti ca tena ca jīvikāṃ kalpeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7851: atha dāni caityārthāya vāpeti bhagavataḥ pūjākarmāya vāpeti anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7856: evam eva sumanāvāpanāya kartavyaṃ yāvat idam ucyate sumanāvāpanāpratisaṃyuktaṃ ||grā ||
XXbhivin_u:7862: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo kolitakanyāyo mallakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo utpalāni granthayitvā vikrīṇanti
XXbhivin_u:7869: tena hi na kṣamati utpalāni granthayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7871: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī utpaladāmām vāmallikādāmām vā āraṅgaṇadāmām vā kṛtvā vikrīṇanti |
XXbhivin_u:7873: atha dāni mālyopahāro bhavati jātimahā vā bodhimahā vā dharmacakramahā vā ānandamahā vā rāhulamahā vā pañcavārṣikā vā |
XXbhivin_u:7877: kiñcāpi bhikṣuṇī mutpalamālām vā mallikāmālām vā āraṅgaṇamālām vā granthayaty anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7880: sumanāgranthikāpratisaṃyuktaṃ evam eva sumanāgranthikāya nānākaraṇaṃ granthiguṇaṃ vā mālāguṇam vā puṣpakañcukam vā kṛtvā vikrīṇāti |
XXbhivin_u:7886: tāyo dāni bhikṣuṇīyo śākiyakanyāyo yāvan mahākulapravrajitāyo saṃjñikāḥ sūtraṃ kartayitvā vikrīṇanti |
XXbhivin_u:7894: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī kambalam vā karpāsam vā kṣaumam vā kauśeyam vā śāṇam vā bhaṅgam vā anyam vā kartayitvā vikrīṇāti tena jīvikāṃ kalpayati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7895: atha dāni bhikṣuṇīye cīvaraṃ pariśrāmaṇaṃ vā kṣīnaṃ vā bhavati labhyaṃ sī bhikṣuṇīprakīrṇaka
XXbhivin_u:7906: vayaṃ te rakṣiṣyāmaḥ sā dān āha gamiṣyāmi āryāye mūlaṃ āryā me rakṣiṣyati |
XXbhivin_u:7907: tāhi tāye nūpurāṇi ābaddhāni karṇikā ābaddhā valayāni āviddhāni alaṅkṛtā rakṣoparaktehi vastrehi parihitā vāvāguṇṭhitā ca |
XXbhivin_u:7909: so dāni manuṣyo tān dvāre sthitvā avaloketi |
XXbhivin_u:7910: yāṃ velāṃ niṣkramiṣyati tato haṃ gṛhṇīṣyāmīti |
XXbhivin_u:7914: sā dāni bhikṣuṇī upāśrayaṃ gatā bhikṣuṇīhi dṛṣṭā |
XXbhivin_u:7918: nāhaṃ pratyodhāvitā api tu mama devaro pratyodhāvayitukāmo |
XXbhivin_u:7924: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayasi |
XXbhivin_u:7925: tena hi na kṣamati ācāraṃ vikopayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7926: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī tyaktamuktena cittena ācāraṃ vikopayati abhikṣuṇī bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:7929: bhikṣur api atyaktamuktena cittena rakṣārthaṃ ācāraṃ vikopayati anāpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:7935: sā dāni aparaṃ mahāntaṃ kulaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭā |
XXbhivin_u:7945: āryāya ahaṃ ettakaṃ caittakaṃ ca dāsye |
XXbhivin_u:7951: yā prathamā bhikṣā lakṣati tāṃ bhikṣusya vā bhikṣuṇīye vā pratiṣṭhāye ti |
XXbhivin_u:7959: tāya dāni bhītāya tharatharāpantīya pātraṃ praṇāmitaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7963: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ āyuṣmān mahākaśyapo bhikṣuṇām ārocayati
XXbhivin_u:7971: duṣkṛtan te nande naiṣa dharmo naiṣa vinayo yāvat |
XXbhivin_u:7972: evañ ca nāma tvaṃ pātraṃ praticchādesi |
XXbhivin_u:7973: tena hi na kṣamati pātraṃ praticchādayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7975: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya prākaṭena pātreṇa piṇḍāya aṭituṃ praticchādayitvā aṭitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7976: yadā bhikṣāṃ praticchati tadā ugghāṭiya praticchitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7977: yadi bhikṣuṃ rathyāyāṃ paśyati ugghāṭiya upadarśayitavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7978: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī prākaṭena pātreṇa aṭati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7979: bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā na ugghāṭiya darśeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:7984: tā dāni bhikṣuṇīyo onaddhavarce varcakuṭīye upaviśanti |
XXbhivin_u:7988: te taṃ dārakaṃ ekāyāṃ bāhāyāṃ gṛhītvā ojjhāyanti |
XXbhivin_u:7992: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati onaddhavarce upaviśituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7994: na dāni kṣamati bhikṣuṇīya onaddhavarcakuṭiṃ kārāpayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:7998: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī onaddhavarcakuṭīyaṃ āgatodakāyam vā upaviśati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:8003: tāya dāni bhikṣuṇīya śākiyakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo mallakanyāyo jentāke snāyanti |
XXbhivin_u:8007: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīye jentāke snāyituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8008: atha dāni gilānā bhavati labhyā vihāre svedayitvā tailena aṅgāni mrakṣayitvā snāyituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8009: sā esā bhikṣuṇī jentāke snāyati vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:8014: tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣuṇīnām āraṅyakāni śayanāsanāni na pratikṣiptāni grāmāntikāni ca akṛtāni |
XXbhivin_u:8015: tena khalu punaḥ samayena pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuṇīśatāni mahāprajāpatīpramukhāni rājakārāme viharanti
XXbhivin_u:8016: tāyo dāni śākiyakanyāyo licchavikanyāyo kolitakanyāyo prāsādikāyo darśanīyāyo |
XXbhivin_u:8022: tāyo puno madhyamayāmaṃ evam paścimaṃ yāmaṃ prahāṇam upaviṣṭāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8025: | yāhi ca middham anokrāntaṃ tāḥ sratti vaihāyasam abhyudgatāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8026: yāvanta samāpattikā yāhi ca middham avakrāntaṃ tāyo kulaputrakehi gṛhya viheṭhitāḥ
XXbhivin_u:8029: yāvat tena hi na kṣamati āraṇyake śayanāsane vastuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8030: atha dāni cātuṣpathikā sarvarātrikā bhavati upāsakopāsikā gacchanti labhyaṃ vastuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8031: tahiṃ pi na kṣamati pratigupte pradeśe vastuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8032: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī āraṇyake śayanāsane vāsaṃ upagacchati varṣam vā vasati vinayātikramam āsādayati
XXbhivin_u:8037: 288. yo bhikṣūṇām āstāro anāstāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8038: yo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āstāro anāstāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ || grā ||
XXbhivin_u:8040: yo bhikṣūṇām uddhāro anuddhāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8042: yo bhikṣuṇīnām uddhāro anuddhāro so bhikṣūṇāṃ || 0 ||
XXbhivin_u:8044: yo bhikṣūṇām abhihāro anabhihāro so bhikṣuṇīnāṃ || ḷ ||
XXbhivin_u:8045: yo bhikṣuṇīnām abhihāro anabhihāro so bhikṣūnāṃ || ḷ ||
XXbhivin_u:8051: yaṃ bhikṣuṇīnām āmiṣaṃ akalpiyaṃ kalpiyaṃ tam bhikṣūṇāṃ || 2 ||
XXbhivin_u:8053: labhyaṃ bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya pratigrahayituṃ sthāpayitvā jatarūparajataṃ agnikalpiyañ ca || labhyaṃ bhikṣuṇīye bhikṣūṇā pratigrāhāpayituṃ sthāpayitvā jātarūpaṃ rajataṃ agnikalpiyañ ca || ṇka ||
XXbhivin_u:8062: na kṣamati bhikṣuṇīnām ekapiṭake eke pi vicāre vastuṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8064: yadāsya bhūyo bhikṣu liṅgaṃ prādurbhavati tadā bhikṣuvihāram āgantavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8065: sā evāsyopasampadā tad eva varṣāgraṃ || tṛ ||
XXbhivin_u:8081: sthūlanandā nāma bhikṣuṇī piṇḍacāram anvaṇṭī taṃhi praviṣṭā |
XXbhivin_u:8082: sā strī tām āha || ārye idaṃ kulaṃ
XXbhivin_u:8084: imam ārye niṣkrāmetu yadi jīvantīyo mucciṣyāmo asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāye vṛttiṃ dāsyāmo āryāye etaṃ bhaviṣyati
XXbhivin_u:8085: | tāya tasyāḥ pātraṃ upanāmitaṃ imaṃhi dehīti |
XXbhivin_u:8086: nānākārāṇāṃ ratnānāṃ pātraṃ pūrayitvā dinnaṃ muktāyāḥ maṇīnāṃ sphoṭikasya musāragalvasya lohikāyāḥ
XXbhivin_u:8088: bhaṭehi ca dṛṣṭā te dān āhaṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8093: etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣuṇīyo mahāprajāpatīye gautamīye ārocayeṃsuḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8099: tena hi na kṣamati ratanaṃ praticchādayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8101: etaṃ dāni mahāntaṃ kulaṃ rājakule nophatam bhavati yāvan na lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:8104: atha dāni lekhyaṃ kṛtam bhavati rakṣā vā kṛtā bhavati bhaṭehi parivāritam bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:8106: imaṃ gṛhaṃ rājakulenopahataṃ yadi tāvaj jīvantīyo mucyāmaḥ asmākaṃ bhaviṣyati āryāyā eva bhaviṣyatīti na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8108: bhagavatā śikṣāpadaṃ prajñaptaṃ na kṣamati niṣkāsayituṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8110: caityasya demaḥ saṃghasya vā demaḥ āryāye eva demo ti gṛhṇītavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8113: atha pṛcchīyati kasyedan ti caityasya saṃghasya mameti |
XXbhivin_u:8116: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī ratanapūrṇapātraṃ praticchādeti vinayātikramam āsādayati |
XXbhivin_u:8121: nadīye ajirāvatīye pāre ubhayato sāṃghikaṃ bhaktaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8127: na kṣamati bhikṣusya bhikṣuṇīya saha ekanāvām abhiruhituṃ ti |
XXbhivin_u:8129: ekabhikṣuṇāpi nāvā paliguddhā bhavati dvihi trihi evaṃ paliguddhā bhavati
XXbhivin_u:8130: | yadā te bhikṣū uttaritāḥ tadā bhikṣuṇīyo ekanāvāparipūrakena tāritāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8132: atha kho mahāprajāpatī gautamī sāyāhnasamaye parikilantehi mahābhūtehi bhagavato pādavandīkāṃ upasaṃkrāntā |
XXbhivin_u:8135: atha mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato tad eva sarvam āroceti |
XXbhivin_u:8137: tena hi aṣṭāhi bhikṣuṇīhi yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8139: ete dāni bhavanti bhaktā vā tarpaṇā vā yavāgupānā vā paraṃ vārṣikā vā mahāpañcavārṣikā vā aṣṭānāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ āsanāni sthāpayitavyāni yathāvṛddhikāya |
XXbhivin_u:8142: tā etā bhikṣuṇīyo aṣṭānām āsanāni sthāpayitvā niṣīdanti vinayātikramam āsādayanti |
XXbhivin_u:8144: aṣṭābhir bhikṣuṇībhir yathāvṛddhikāya upaveṣṭavyam u śiṣṭābhi yathāgatikāya || 0 ||
XXbhivin_u:8158: sarve anye nava padā anūnā pratiṣitavyā puna tahiṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8163: yatrāsi yānaṃ phalavikṛtiṃ nirdiśet tahiṃ vijñaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8164: yatrāsi sahaniṣadyā ekorttakaṃ tahiṃ samādiśet chatraṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8166: yatrāsi śastrakarma nirdiśet tahiṃ and āpattiḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8167: yatrāsi viśokadarśanaṃ āpattipratikarma tatra nirdiśed vijñaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8168: etāvatā uddhārāḥ prakīrṇake ye ca ovṛṣāḥ vargaṃ samuddhariya dvādaśamaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8169: nava padāni punar eva bhikṣuṇīnāṃ prakīrṇake sarvaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhikṣuprakīrṇakato vargās trayodaśa kāryāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8170: anye ca pañca vargāyutakā yathā bhikṣuṇīsūtre |
XXbhivin_u:8172: jentākaṃ varca kaṭhinaṃ uddharitvā avaśeṣā tathaiva kāryāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8174: taṃ sarvaṃ saṅkale puna vargā aṣṭādaśa prakīrṇake svayaṃbhunā nirdiṣṭā |
XXbhivin_u:8176: pañcaśatāni anūnāni apare ca padā catustriṃśat |
XXbhivin_u:8371: 'phagspa dge 'dunphalchen pai 'jig rtenlas 'dasparsmrabai dge sloṅgi 'dulba silbu rdzogsso
XXbhivin_u:8381: kahiṃ dāni saṃgho śīlavān guṇavān bhadrako śikṣākāmo vaktavyaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8384: kahiṃ dāni abhiyuktā bhikṣubhikṣuṇīyo vā kriyāyāṃ vā |
XXbhivin_u:8385: khaṇḍapralugge vā uddeśe svādhyāye yoge manasikāre kahiṃ vā śīghraṃ parisamāpyet |
XXbhivin_u:8388: amukaṃhi bhikṣū vā bhikṣuṇīyo vā abhiyuktā ity ādi |
XXbhivin_u:8389: sā eṣā bhikṣuṇī sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ ātmano pariṇāmayen niḥsargika |
XXbhivin_u:8390: sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pudgalasya pariṇāmayet pācattikaṃ || gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikaṃ
XXbhivin_u:8393: bhikṣur api gaṇalābhaṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayati vinayātikramaḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8395: yā puna bhikṣuṇī jānantī gaṇalābhaṃ pariṇataṃ gaṇasya pariṇāmayet pācattikaṃ || lṛ ||
XXbhivin_u:8404: vargāvaśeṣāḥ deśanā ca vihāro ca bhikṣuṇīnāñ ca ye daśa praṇītasammatam mātraṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8405: yāvat vāsādanā iha chadanā sahaśayyā ca |
XXbhivin_u:8408: araṇyāyāṃ ca śāṭikā dvāviṃśati śuddhekehi uddhārā bhikṣuṇīnāṃ pravuccati |
XXbhivin_u:8409: deśanām uddharitvāna saṃcintyaṃ samodahe puno cātra ||
XXbhivin_u:8410: atha puno vihāraṃ uddhariya bhaṇeya ko kuccaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8412: apanetvā samodahe cīvaraṃ puno tatra vijñaptim uddharitvāna aparihatā catu nirdiṣṭā
XXbhivin_u:8415: tatra chādanā uddharitvāna udakahāsyaṃ ca nirdiṣṭaṃ |
XXbhivin_u:8418: samoho puno bhavati tatra eva tāvatā ca |
XXbhivin_u:8423: yate te bhūṣāḥ purimā ca sapta vargāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8426: yutaṃ yan bhikṣuṇīsūtre taṃ sarvam saṃkaletvāna śataṃ bhavati |
XXbhivin_u:8428: uddiṣṭā āryamiśrikāyo ekacattālaṃ śataṃ śuddhapācattikā dharmāḥ |
XXbhivin_u:8433: yasmāt tūṣṇīm evam etad dhārayāmi || ḥ ||
XXbhivin_u:8435: atha khalu bhagavān mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīm āmantreti |
XXbhivin_u:8436: ekam idaṃ gautami samayaṃ tathāgato ihaiva śrāvastīyaṃ viharati |
